summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DevisPro French quote management application. Fixed critical frontend compilation issue and verified all functionality.

minor_issues.impact: SendGrid email functionality not working in test environment
minor_issues.note: Expected failure due to SendGrid configuration in test environment

critical_bugs_fixed.issue: Visual edits babel plugin causing infinite recursion and preventing frontend compilation
critical_bugs_fixed.fix_applied: Disabled visual edits plugin in craco.config.js

ui_validation.details: Professional French interface with proper Manrope font, clean layout, and appropriate color scheme
Login and registration pages fully functional with proper French text and form validation
All sidebar navigation working correctly between Dashboard, Clients, Services, Quotes, Settings
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for automated testing

success_percentage.backend: 96% (22/23 tests passed - only email sending failed due to test env)

action_item_for_main_agent: Verify SendGrid API key configuration for email functionality in production environment. All other features are working perfectly.
